DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness investigational drug call doxercalciferol participant moderate severe chronic plaque psoriasis , comparison placebo ( `` sugar pill '' ) . All study relate care provide include doctor visit , physical exam , laboratory test study medication . Total length participation 28 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Effectiveness Doxercalciferol Capsules Participants With Moderate Severe Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , dose-ranging , parallel group study evaluate efficacy safety doxercalciferol give orally , daily 24 week participant moderate severe chronic plaque psoriasis . Participants randomize stratified site Psoriasis Area Severity Index ( PASI ) score one three active treatment group placebo group .
